game.name: Train Simulator: Bahnstrecke Strasbourg - Karlsruhe Route Add-On
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Bienvenue en France and willkommen in Deutschland! Cross the French/German border aboard high-speed traction and heavy freight motive power with Bahnstrecke Strasbourg - Karlsruhe in Train Simulator.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Bienvenue en France and willkommen in Deutschland! Cross the French/German border aboard high-speed traction and heavy freight motive power with Bahnstrecke Strasbourg - Karlsruhe in Train Simulator.
